Commands.Trine: Own BRV × 1.2 + HP attack  Target: 1 turn Blind, HP Attack Disable
Commands.Light of Judgment: 2-hit BRV magic attack + HP attack  Target: 2 turns ATK Down I, DEF Down I, SPD Down β
Commands.Havoc Wing: 3-HIT magic BRV+HP attack  Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to debuffed targets  BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV\Moderate chance to BREAK target  Low Action Delay  Inflicts 「Ridiculous Clown」 for 6 turns  Extends granted buffs by 2 turns  Turns 「BRV Attack」, 「Meteor」 to 「Meteor+」  　∟ 6-HIT magic BRV attack   「Ridiculous Clown」 has the following effects:  - Lowers Attack, Defense and Speed  - Steals BRV every turn (Sap effect)

Passives.Trine Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using  Trine
Passives.Critical BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after dealing a critical hit
Passives.Debuff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Light of Judgment Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Light of Judgment
Passives.A clown's pleasure: Slightly raises BRV Damage when attacking an enemy not targeting self
Passives.Critical Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after dealing a critical hit
Passives.The Power of Destruction: Slightly raises Max BRV and Attack while an enemy is debuffed

Weapons.Jolly Hair Ornament CP: 15: When using  Trine :- Increases the BRV gain multiplier- Extends the duration of  Blind  and  HP Silence - Turns  BRV Attack  to  Meteor  for 1 use
Weapons.Mysterious Hair Ornament CP: 35: Light of Judgment  use +1When using  Light of Judgment :- Raises BRV potencyImproves all debuffs and extends their duration- Turns  BRV Attack  to  Meteor  for 1 use
